exm.mng: lit. once said, a team of horses cannot unsay it (idiom); a promise must be kept
exm.pyn: yī yán jì chū , sì mǎ nán zhuī

exm.mng: lit. once said, a team of horses cannot unsay it (idiom); a promise must be kept
exm.pyn: yī yán jì chū , sì mǎ nán zhuī

exm.mng: a nobleman's word is his bond (proverb)
exm.pyn: jūn zǐ yī yán , sì mǎ nán zhuī
